item.description: This Saturday, Nov. 13th the weather will be Wonderful for a Woodland Walk. This easy 3.5 mile walk goes through the woods along the water's edge of Hopedale Pond, crossing over the stone bridge. After, we can go out for coffee, tea or breakfast. Meet at the corner of Dutcher Street and Hopedale Street at 9:45 am, in the town of Hopedale, MA. Parking is Free. We will begin this lovely adventure at 10 am. There are picnic tables for a land mark. Come join us for this lovely adventure, and discover this hidden JEWEL ! A lot of laughter is welcomed. Yes, dogs too.
item.how_to_find_us: Meet at Corner of Dutcher and Hopedale Streets in Hopedale, MA -next to pond. Free Parking. There are picnic tables for a landmark.
item.name: Lovely Autumn Woodland Walk around Hopedale Pond
